net.sf.wubiq.dotmatrix

Class ESCPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.dotmatrix.ESCPrinter

  • public class ESCPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Source code from http://code.google.com/p/escprinter/source/browse/trunk/net/drayah/matrixprinter/ESCPrinter.java It let printing directly to a Dot matrix. Values are received in Twips (inch * 1440)
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

    • Constructor Detail

      • ESCPrinter

        public ESCPrinter(java.lang.String printer,
                  int pageWidth,
                  int pageHeight,
                  boolean escp24pin)
           throws javax.print.PrintException
        Creates a new instance of printer streamer.
        Parameters:
        printer - Printer url.
        pageWidth - Width of the page in twips (inch * 1440).
        pageHeight - Height of the page in twips (inch * 1440).
        escp24pin - True if the streamer is to print to a 24pin printer.
        Throws:
        javax.print.PrintException

      • ESCPrinter

           throws javax.print.PrintException
